price: 169. Nabiyow Diggah tama Yallih gital Qeebit Rabeh yan mari usun rabe maray tu-Able waah niqmatat Anee waa ken makkalin, wonna hinnay usun nuwwoonuuh sinni Rabbih xaqul jannat Addal sinni Rizqhi yattakammeeniih hatakat yanin.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
